channel.title: Marketing Secrets Exposed!
channel.description: FINALLY EXPOSED! Get the dirty truth on what ALL the TOP EXPERIENCED MARKETERS are doing on a daily basis allowing them to live their FABULOUS LIFESTYLES. Val Smyth has exposed these TOP MARKETERS SECRETS by putting them in the HOT-SEAT in a one-on-one relentless interview on what their most sought after secrets are. This information would cost you hundreds, if not thousands, of dollars to get these TOP MARKETING GURUS to unveil their most guarded secrets.
channel.copyright: Copyright Â© 2007 BKS Mindset Marketing All rights reserved.
channel.itunes:author: Brad and Kelly Smith
channel.itunes:summary: Marketing Secrets Exposed is a raw step by step look at how top successful marketers are making money. Live interviews with Val Smyth and top successful marketing experts give you access to their most guarded secrets.
channel.itunes:subtitle: Marketing Secrets Exposed is a raw step by step look at how top successful marketers are making money.

item.title: Fortune Is In The Follow Up
item.description: This week are discussing about nuturing your list with follow up. You may have the hugest list in the world but it may be useless if you only contact them to pitch something. Nuture and build that relationship with automation.
item.itunes:author: Brad and Kelly Smith
item.itunes:summary: This week are discussing about nuturing your list with follow up. You may have the hugest list in the world but it may be useless if you only contact them to pitch something. Nuture and build that relationship with automation.

item.title: Building A List
item.description: If you don't have a list, then you don't have a business. All of the successful marketers, internet marketers and business people know this. This week we talk about different list building technics, autoresponders or personal assistants and advertising with internet marketing.
item.itunes:author: Brad and Kelly Smith
item.itunes:summary: If you don't have a list, then you don't have a business. All of the successful marketers, internet marketers and business people know this. This week we talk about different list building technics, autoresponders or personal assistants and advertising with internet marketing.

item.title: Branding Yourself - What's Your Story?
item.description: Branding Yourself - What's Your Story? This week we talk about branding yourself, the importance of having a story and how to create a story. Marketing relationships begin when you - as the promoter, extend your hand in friendship and offer something of value ......... YOURSELF.
